title: A Comparative Study on Synthetic Facial Data Generation Techniques for Face Recognition
summary: Facial recognition has become a widely used method for authentication and identification, with applications for secure access and locating missing persons. Its success is largely attributed to deep learning, which leverages large datasets and effective loss functions to learn discriminative features.
